author: wn.com
title: Camp Hill School Board candidates look to maintain quality education despite mounting costs
text: If a magical solution to the spiraling costs faced by area public schools exists – particularly, but not limited to, those related to ever-increasing pension costs – the abracadabra has not yet been found. And the Camp Hill School District
